title: Intrusion Detection System (IDS) Curriculum
body: The IDS Curriculum v5.0 focuses on Intrusion Detection Systems (IDS). An IDS is a security tool that monitors network or system activities for malicious activities or policy violations. This curriculum likely covers fundamental concepts, different types of IDS (e.g., signature-based, anomaly-based), deployment strategies, rule writing, and analysis of alerts. The goal is to equip learners with the knowledge and skills to understand, implement, and manage IDS effectively.
